Title: Relates to enacting the "New York State Phoenix Act"
Summary: Relates to enacting the "New York State Phoenix Act"; extends the statute of limitations for certain family offenses to ten years; establishes the crime of coercive control.
LawCode: Amd §30.10, CP L; amd §§214-b & 840, Exec L; add §135.80, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, the executive law and the penal law, in relation to enacting the "New York State Phoenix Act"
